name: dbviewer
description: Viewer application that connects to patent DB

scripts.startNext: docker start sqlserver && set USEDB=NextIdea& electron .
scripts.startUpload: docker start sqlserver && set USEDB=NextIdea& node ./test/3_insertPatents.js
scripts.testUpdate: docker start sqlserver && set USEDB=NextIdea& node ./test/5_updatePatents.test.js

author: Bill Farmilo
